name: Life Story
description: Complete the Master Chief Saga playlist.
lockedDescription: Complete the Master Chief Saga playlist.
tutorial: To get this achievement, complete the Master Chief Saga Playlist located in the Cross-game section in the campaign lobby. This playlist contains every mission from Halo:CE through Halo 4.

name: Just Getting Started
tutorial: Kill a combined total of 100 enemies (campaign or multiplayer).

name: Balaho's Most Wanted
tutorial: Kill a combined total of 100 Grunts in PVE mode (Campaign, Firefight, Spartan Ops). This achievement is easily unlocked by playing normally.

name: The One Percent
tutorial: Kill a combined total of 100 Elites in PVE mode (Campaign, Firefight, Spartan Ops). This achievement is easily unlocked by playing normally.

name: Spoilsport
tutorial: Kill a combined total of 100 Jackals in PVE mode (Campaign, Firefight, Spartan Ops). This achievement is easily unlocked by playing normally.

name: Going Bananas
tutorial: Kill a combined total of 100 Brutes in PVE mode (Campaign, Firefight). This achievement is easily unlocked by playing normally.

name: Hunters Hunted
tutorial: Easiet method: Start a Custom Firefight match in Halo:Reach and set all the enemies to be Hunters, and set the player traits so you are inviniclbe and have a 300% damage boost.

name: Checkmate
tutorial: Kill a combined total of 100 Watchers in PVE mode (Campaign, Spartan Ops). This achievement is easily unlocked by playing normally.

name: I Was Wondering What Would Break First
tutorial: Kill a combined total of 100 Knights in PVE mode (Campaign, Spartan Ops). This achievement is easily unlocked by playing normally.

name: Pest Control
tutorial: Kill a combined total of 100 Crawlers in PVE mode (Campaign, Spartan Ops). This achievement is easily unlocked by playing normally.

name: Thanks A Killion
tutorial: This achievement can be unlocked by playing normally with patience. To speed it up, play Firefight in Halo:Reach or Halo 3:ODST to rack up kills quicker.

name: Medal Completionist
tutorial: This achievement can be unlocked by playing campaign normally with patience.

name: The Guardians Are Coming
tutorial: This can be done on every multiplayer map that has any death boundries. Example: Load the map Terminal in Halo 2 and die from the train.

name: Bite The Hand
description: Kill a 343 developer in matchmaking or someone who has this achievement.
lockedDescription: Kill a 343 developer in matchmaking or someone who has this achievement.
tutorial: Nearly everyone has this achievement (it spreads faster then COVID-19), so this shouldnt take more then a match or two. Just kill players in matchmaking until you get it :).

name: Mystery Achievement
tutorial: In a Custom game lobby, edit and save a gametype. When the promtp to enter the name appears, enter in '.fortune'. This will reveal a fun easter egg and the achievement will unlock.

name: Where Am I?
tutorial: Does this really need a tutorial?

name: I Got This
tutorial: Does this really need a tutorial?

name: Tempered Blade
tutorial: Try your best and win matches!

name: Forged in Fire
tutorial: Try your best and win matches!

name: Sample Plate
tutorial: Complete any 3 cross-game campaign playlist, located in the campaign lobby under 'cross-game'.

name: I Dabble in Slaying
tutorial: Complete any cross-game campaign playlist, located in the campaign lobby under 'cross-game'.

name: Stick With It...A Little Longer
description: Play a multiplayer or co-op game at least 3 months after your first game.
lockedDescription: Play a multiplayer or co-op game at least 3 months after your first game.
tutorial: For this one, just stick with the game for 3 months. It is Halo after all, so that should be easy!

name: Veteran
description: Complete all campaigns on Normal difficulty.
lockedDescription: Complete all campaigns on Normal difficulty.
tutorial: Complete Halo:CE through Halo 4 on atleast Normal difficulty. This achievement will unlock defaultly if you beat the campaigns on Heroic or Legendary as well.

name: War Hero
description: Complete all campaigns on Heroic difficulty.
lockedDescription: Complete all campaigns on Heroic difficulty.
tutorial: Complete Halo:CE through Halo 4 on atleast Heroic difficulty. This achievement will unlock defaultly if you beat the campaigns on Legendary as well.

name: Legend
description: Complete all campaigns on Legendary difficulty.
lockedDescription: Complete all campaigns on Legendary difficulty.
tutorial: Complete Halo:CE through Halo 4 on Legendary difficulty. You can do it!

name: Lore Master
tutorial: Activate all terminals in Halo:CE through Halo 4. Every terminal in the game has its own seperate achievement, so look at those for guides!

name: Your Journey Begins
description: Complete a campaign mission or a match of multiplayer.
lockedDescription: Complete a campaign mission or a match of multiplayer.
tutorial: Does this really need a tutorial :)?

name: LASO Master
description: Complete each individual game-specific LASO playlist for every Halo game.
lockedDescription: Complete each individual game-specific LASO playlist for every Halo game.
tutorial: Their is an exploit where you can unlock LASO achievements if you find another player who has a checkpoint on the last mission of a games LASO playlist. Other than that? Good luck..

name: The Silent Cartographer
description: Halo CE: Complete The Silent Cartographer.
lockedDescription: Halo CE: Complete The Silent Cartographer.
tutorial: Complete the mission The Silent Cartographer.

name: Assault on the Control Room
description: Halo CE: Complete Assault on the Control Room.
lockedDescription: Halo CE: Complete Assault on the Control Room.
tutorial: Complete the mission Assault on the Control Room.

name: Pillar of Autumn
description: Halo CE: Complete The Pillar of Autumn.
lockedDescription: Halo CE: Complete The Pillar of Autumn.
tutorial: Complete the mission The Pillar of Autumn.

name: Halo
tutorial: Complete the mission Halo.

name: Truth and Reconciliation
description: Halo CE: Complete The Truth and Reconciliation.
lockedDescription: Halo CE: Complete The Truth and Reconciliation.
tutorial: Complete the mission The Truth and Reconciliation.

name: 343 Guilty Spark
tutorial: Complete the mission 343 Guilty Spark.

name: The Library
tutorial: Complete the mission The Library.

name: Two Betrayals
tutorial: Complete the mission Two Betrayals.

name: Keyes
tutorial: Complete the mission Keyes.

name: The Maw
tutorial: Complete the mission The Maw.

name: Hit The Beach
description: Halo CE: Beat the par time on The Silent Cartographer.
lockedDescription: Halo CE: Beat the par time on The Silent Cartographer.
tutorial: You need to complete the mission in under 15 minutes. Using a Warthog, you can skip the majority of the mission.

name: Would It've Killed You To Take The Lift
description: Halo CE: Beat the par time on Assault on the Control Room.
lockedDescription: Halo CE: Beat the par time on Assault on the Control Room.
tutorial: You need to complete the mission in under 15 minutes. Using a trick, you can skip the majority of the mission, it is super cool.

name: Didn't Like This Ship Anyways
description: Halo CE: Beat the par time on The Pillar of Autumn.
lockedDescription: Halo CE: Beat the par time on The Pillar of Autumn.
tutorial: You need to complete the mission in under 15 minutes. Not many tricks on this one, but watch the video for help.

name: Flyover Country
description: Halo CE: Beat the par time on Halo.
lockedDescription: Halo CE: Beat the par time on Halo.
tutorial: You need to complete the mission in under 20 minutes. Their are a couple tricks to save time.

name: You Can't Handle the Truth
description: Halo CE: Beat the par time on The Truth and Reconciliation.
lockedDescription: Halo CE: Beat the par time on The Truth and Reconciliation.
tutorial: You need to complete the mission in under 20 minutes. Their are a couple tricks to save time. If having trouble, just do this one on Easy difficulty.

name: Lightning in a Bottle
description: Halo CE: Beat the par time on 343 Guilty Spark.
lockedDescription: Halo CE: Beat the par time on 343 Guilty Spark.
tutorial: You need to complete the mission in under 15 minutes. This one is pretty easy to just run through the mission.

name: TLDR
description: Halo CE: Beat the par time on The Library.
lockedDescription: Halo CE: Beat the par time on The Library.
tutorial: You need to complete the mission in under 25 minutes. I highly recommend watching the guide to learn enemy patterns and skips.

name: Whistle Stop Tour
description: Halo CE: Beat the par time on Two Betrayals.
lockedDescription: Halo CE: Beat the par time on Two Betrayals.
tutorial: You need to complete the mission in under 20 minutes. You can skip a majority of the mission with Naked Eli's guide.

name: Scurty Bump
description: Halo CE: Beat the par time on Keyes.
lockedDescription: Halo CE: Beat the par time on Keyes.
tutorial: You need to complete the mission in under 15 minutes. You can skip a majority of the mission using the 'Keyes Bump' trick, seen in Naked Eli's guide.

name: All You Can Eat
description: Halo CE: Beat the par time on The Maw.
lockedDescription: Halo CE: Beat the par time on The Maw.
tutorial: You need to complete the mission in under 15 minutes. Not many tricks on this mission, just need to be fast!

name: Did Somebody Say...
description: Halo CE: Beat the par time on all Halo: CE levels.
lockedDescription: Halo CE: Beat the par time on all Halo: CE levels.
tutorial: Beat the Par Time on all Halo: CE missions. Each mission has its own par time achievement with guide, so look for those!

name: Charted
description: Halo CE: Beat the par score on The Silent Cartographer.
lockedDescription: Halo CE: Beat the par score on The Silent Cartographer.
tutorial: Score over 18,000 points. Playing on Legendary and killing every enemy will usually net you way over par score.
